price: Mi smo ih na kušnju stavili, kao što smo vlasnike jedne bašče na kušnju stavili kad su se zakleli da će je, sigurno, rano izjutra obrati,
arabic: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُواْ لَيَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā balawnāhum kamā balawnā aṣḥāba al-janati idh aqsamū layaṣrimunnahā muṣ'biḥīna
